body:
Is it still numerically stable if we use the [non-reducing C implementation](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/functional.py#L1235) with `probs` instead of `logits`?
```py
return -torch.nn.functiona.binary_cross_entropy(self.probs, value, reduce=False)
```
(Note that `torch.nn.functional.binary_cross_entropy_with_logits()` does not allow `reduce=False`)
